wikipedia_page.main: David Dawson (born 1960) is a British artist, born near Pwllheli, North Wales.

response: Goodman's first solo exhibition was at Cadogan Contemporary Fine Art in London in 1988, with a further three exhibitions there in 1990, 1992 and 1995. She had a solo show  at Theo Waddington Fine Art, London in 1997, and took part in a two-person show at Marlborough Fine Art, London, in 2004, with David Dawson
* Marlborough Fine Art, Two London Painters: Catherine Goodman and David Dawson (London: Marlborough Fine Art,  2004)
